channel.title: Victorian Carol Singers Hire UK
channel.description: The best and most experienced Dickensian carolers

item.title: Annual Carol Service, Lambeth House, London, Carol Singing Trio
item.dc:creator: victoriancarols_wp
item.description: We all enjoyed your performance tremendously. All of our guests have praised how you made them feel so festive and Christmassy! Best wishes for Christmas and a happy new year! Idit, Senior Special Events FundraiserRonald McDonald House Charities UK
item.content:encoded:
We all enjoyed your performance tremendously. All of our guests have praised how you made them feel so festive and Christmassy!

Best wishes for Christmas and a happy new year!

Idit, Senior Special Events Fundraiser
Ronald McDonald House Charities UK

item.title: Annual Carol Service, Lambeth House, London, Carol Singing Trio
item.dc:creator: victoriancarols_wp
item.description: I just wanted to echo my huge thanks as you were brilliant! Have a wonderful Christmas and New Year. Anna, National Events ManagerRonald McDonald House Charities Manchester
item.content:encoded:
I just wanted to echo my huge thanks as you were brilliant!

Have a wonderful Christmas and New Year.

Anna, National Events Manager
Ronald McDonald House Charities Manchester

item.title: Christmas Eve Socially Distanced Meet & Greet, Broadway, Worcestershire, Carol Singing Quartet
item.dc:creator: victoriancarols_wp
item.description: “Thank you for coming to sing, it was really appreciated by our guests and team. One guest even said that they did not feel festive at all due to what has gone on this year but when they saw and heard you, said this woke them up and gave them the festive spirit!   What is … Continue reading "Christmas Eve Socially Distanced Meet & Greet, Broadway, Worcestershire, Carol Singing Quartet"
item.content:encoded:
“Thank you for coming to sing, it was really appreciated by our guests and team. One guest even said that they did not feel festive at all due to what has gone on this year but when they saw and heard you, said this woke them up and gave them the festive spirit!  

What is your availability for the 24th December 2021 as we may well look to do something similar?”

item.title: Virtual Christmas Party, Zoom, Carol Singing Trio
item.dc:creator: victoriancarols_wp
item.description: Just wanted to say a MASSIVE thank you for joining us last night for our virtual Christmas party!! You were all amazing and really added to the Christmas festivities. We hope you enjoyed your evening and had a giggle at the craziness?! Many thanks again for all your hard work (the mash ups still baffle … Continue reading "Virtual Christmas Party, Zoom, Carol Singing Trio"
item.content:encoded:
Just wanted to say a MASSIVE thank you for joining us last night for our virtual Christmas party!! You were all amazing and really added to the Christmas festivities.

We hope you enjoyed your evening and had a giggle at the craziness?!

Many thanks again for all your hard work (the mash ups still baffle me, you did such a good job)

Merry Christmas to you all!!
All the best,
Katie x

item.title: Christmas Market, Manchester Royal Exchange, Carol Singing Quartet
item.dc:creator: victoriancarols_wp
item.description: “Just a quick note to say Ross and the team were fantastic (again) on Saturday! They contributed hugely to a very successful Christmas shopping event and the customers – and retailers – loved them! I hope to get the go-ahead to do again for 2020 so I’ll no doubt be in touch in the new … Continue reading "Christmas Market, Manchester Royal Exchange, Carol Singing Quartet"
item.content:encoded:
“Just a quick note to say Ross and the team were fantastic (again) on Saturday! They contributed hugely to a very successful Christmas shopping event and the customers – and retailers – loved them!

I hope to get the go-ahead to do again for 2020 so I’ll no doubt be in touch in the new year! In the meantime, have a lovely Christmas, and a very Happy New Year!” – Karen

item.title: Exclusive Client Evening – Mulbury, London, Carolling Trio
item.dc:creator: victoriancarols_wp
item.description: “You guys were amazing and you definitely brought the Christmas spirit to our store! We loved having you! I will definitely be in touch with you for future projects! Thanks again so much.”  – Camila
item.content:encoded: “You guys were amazing and you definitely brought the Christmas spirit to our store! We loved having you! I will definitely be in touch with you for future projects! Thanks again so much.”  – Camila

item.title: Company Lunch, Waybridge, Surrey, Carol Singing Quartet
item.dc:creator: victoriancarols_wp
item.description: “I just wanted to say a massive thank you for Friday’s quartet. As ever they were brilliant, they were all very friendly and were keen to take requests!! They really lifted spirits and made everyone feel very Christmas like!! Again many thanks – and I’m sure I will be in touch around the same time … Continue reading "Company Lunch, Waybridge, Surrey, Carol Singing Quartet"
item.content:encoded: “I just wanted to say a massive thank you for Friday’s quartet. As ever they were brilliant, they were all very friendly and were keen to take requests!! They really lifted spirits and made everyone feel very Christmas like!! Again many thanks – and I’m sure I will be in touch around the same time next year!!!” – Guy

item.title: Christmas Party, Landmark Hotel, London
item.dc:creator: victoriancarols_wp
item.description: A massive thank you for a fantastic performance. It was much appreciated and it sounded wonderful. I am sure we will speak again sometime in the future. Until then, wishing you all a wonderful Christmas and new year!
item.content:encoded: A massive thank you for a fantastic performance. It was much appreciated and it sounded wonderful. I am sure we will speak again sometime in the future. Until then, wishing you all a wonderful Christmas and new year!

item.title: Christmas Market, Eight Members Club, London
item.dc:creator: victoriancarols_wp
item.description: “The quartet were absolutely amazing last night and will definitely recommend you to anyone else looking for carol singers/performers – very, very happy. Thank you. Have a wonderful Christmas.” – Nancy
item.content:encoded: “The quartet were absolutely amazing last night and will definitely recommend you to anyone else looking for carol singers/performers – very, very happy. Thank you.  Have a wonderful Christmas.” – Nancy

item.title: Corporate Christmas Drinks Reception, St Albans, Hertfordshire, Carol Singing Trio

item.description: “Thanks to you and the other singers for the lovely performance. As promised, here are some photos from last night (credit GK Studios).” Best – Kat, Debenhams Ottaway LLP
